title: Sky Pirates
creator_credit: John Lamond Motion Pictures Production, John Lamond, Michael Hirsh and Colin Eggleston
brief_description: Set during World War II, this film is about a plane crashing into the Pacific Ocean and the survivors finding themselves in a time warp. Stars John Hargreaves, Meredith Phillips and Max Phipps.
